dbQuery.query: WITH admin_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'), user_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS} ) RWN ,all_in_one.ID,all_in_one.NAME,all_in_one.category,all_in_one.descr,all_in_one.doc_type,all_in_one.file_name, all_in_one.CUSER_ID,all_in_one.CTIME FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ld.DOC_ID ID ,ld.NAME ,ld.DESCR ,ld.PROVIDER ,ld.TIME_STAMP ,ld.GID ,(select descr from web50.lib_doc_type_ref where doc_type_id=ld.DOC_TYPE_ID) doc_type ,(select d.name from web50.lib_doc d where d.doc_id= ld.PARENT_DOC_ID) CATEGORY ,ld.CTIME ,ld.CUSER_ID ,ld.MUSER_ID ,ld.MTIME ,ld.DOC_ID ,ldv.STORAGE_ID ,ldv.FILE_NAME ,u.login CUSER_ID_LBL ,sr.descr STATUS_ID_LBL ,TR.DESCR DOC_TYPE_ID_LBL FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC ld LEFT JOIN WEB50.LIB_DOC_VERSION ldv ON ldv.DOC_ID=ld.DOC_ID JOIN web50.b_status_ref sr ON ld.status_id = sr.status_id LEFT JOIN web50.b_user_private u ON ld.cuser_id = u.user_id JOIN web50.lib_doc_type_ref tr ON tr.doc_type_id = ld.doc_type_id WHERE ld.DOC_TYPE_ID NOT IN (37,38,41,0) AND (((ld.status_id = 1 OR (ld.cuser_id = :USER_ID AND ld.status_id = 0 )) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_grants)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admin_grants))) d WHERE {FILTER}) all_in_one) sorted WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}

WITH admin_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'), user_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') SELECT count(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT ld.DOC_ID ID ,ld.NAME ,ld.DESCR ,ld.PROVIDER ,ld.STATUS_ID ,ld.TIME_STAMP ,ld.GID ,ld.DOC_TYPE_ID ,ld.PARENT_DOC_ID ,ld.CTIME ,ld.CUSER_ID ,ld.MUSER_ID ,ld.MTIME ,ld.DOC_ID ,ldv.STORAGE_ID ,ldv.FILE_NAME ,u.login CUSER_ID_LBL ,sr.descr STATUS_ID_LBL ,TR.DESCR DOC_TYPE_ID_LBL FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC ld LEFT JOIN WEB50.LIB_DOC_VERSION ldv ON ldv.DOC_ID=ld.DOC_ID JOIN web50.b_status_ref sr ON ld.status_id = sr.status_id LEFT JOIN web50.b_user_private u ON ld.cuser_id = u.user_id JOIN web50.lib_doc_type_ref tr ON tr.doc_type_id = ld.doc_type_id
WHERE ld.DOC_TYPE_ID NOT IN (37,38,41,0) AND (((ld.status_id = 1 OR (ld.cuser_id = :USER_ID AND ld.status_id = 0 )) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_grants)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admin_grants))) d WHERE {FILTER}

WITH admin_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'), user_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS} ) RWN ,all_in_one.ID,all_in_one.CUSER_ID,all_in_one.STATUS_ID,all_in_one.NAME,all_in_one.CTIME,all_in_one.FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ld.DOC_ID ID ,ld.NAME ,ld.DESCR ,ld.PROVIDER ,ld.STATUS_ID ,ld.TIME_STAMP ,ld.GID ,ld.DOC_TYPE_ID ,ld.PARENT_DOC_ID ,ld.CTIME ,ld.CUSER_ID ,ld.MUSER_ID ,ld.MTIME ,ld.DOC_ID ,ldv.STORAGE_ID ,ldv.FILE_NAME ,u.login CUSER_ID_LBL ,sr.descr STATUS_ID_LBL ,TR.DESCR DOC_TYPE_ID_LBL FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC ld LEFT JOIN WEB50.LIB_DOC_VERSION ldv ON ldv.DOC_ID=ld.DOC_ID JOIN web50.b_status_ref sr ON ld.status_id = sr.status_id LEFT JOIN web50.b_user_private u ON ld.cuser_id = u.user_id JOIN web50.lib_doc_type_ref tr ON tr.doc_type_id = ld.doc_type_id WHERE ld.DOC_TYPE_ID = 37 AND (((ld.status_id = 1 OR (ld.cuser_id = :USER_ID AND ld.status_id = 0 )) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_grants)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admin_grants))) d WHERE {FILTER}) all_in_one) sorted WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}

WITH admin_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'), user_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') SELECT count(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT ld.DOC_ID ID ,ld.NAME ,ld.DESCR ,ld.PROVIDER ,ld.STATUS_ID ,ld.TIME_STAMP ,ld.GID ,ld.DOC_TYPE_ID ,ld.PARENT_DOC_ID ,ld.CTIME ,ld.CUSER_ID ,ld.MUSER_ID ,ld.MTIME ,ld.DOC_ID ,ldv.STORAGE_ID ,ldv.FILE_NAME ,u.login CUSER_ID_LBL ,sr.descr STATUS_ID_LBL ,TR.DESCR DOC_TYPE_ID_LBL FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC ld LEFT JOIN WEB50.LIB_DOC_VERSION ldv ON ldv.DOC_ID=ld.DOC_ID JOIN web50.b_status_ref sr ON ld.status_id = sr.status_id LEFT JOIN web50.b_user_private u ON ld.cuser_id = u.user_id JOIN web50.lib_doc_type_ref tr ON tr.doc_type_id = ld.doc_type_id
WHERE ld.DOC_TYPE_ID = 37 AND (((ld.status_id = 1 OR (ld.cuser_id = :USER_ID AND ld.status_id = 0 )) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_grants)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admin_grants))) d WHERE {FILTER}

WITH admin_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'), user_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS} ) RWN ,all_in_one.ID,all_in_one.CUSER_ID,all_in_one.STATUS_ID,all_in_one.NAME,all_in_one.CTIME,all_in_one.FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ld.DOC_ID ID ,ld.NAME ,ld.DESCR ,ld.PROVIDER ,ld.STATUS_ID ,ld.TIME_STAMP ,ld.GID ,ld.DOC_TYPE_ID ,ld.PARENT_DOC_ID ,ld.CTIME ,ld.CUSER_ID ,ld.MUSER_ID ,ld.MTIME ,ld.DOC_ID ,ldv.STORAGE_ID ,ldv.FILE_NAME ,u.login CUSER_ID_LBL ,sr.descr STATUS_ID_LBL ,TR.DESCR DOC_TYPE_ID_LBL FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC ld LEFT JOIN WEB50.LIB_DOC_VERSION ldv ON ldv.DOC_ID=ld.DOC_ID JOIN web50.b_status_ref sr ON ld.status_id = sr.status_id LEFT JOIN web50.b_user_private u ON ld.cuser_id = u.user_id JOIN web50.lib_doc_type_ref tr ON tr.doc_type_id = ld.doc_type_id WHERE ld.DOC_TYPE_ID = 38 AND (((ld.status_id = 1 OR (ld.cuser_id = :USER_ID AND ld.status_id = 0 )) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_grants)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admin_grants))) d WHERE {FILTER}) all_in_one) sorted WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}

WITH admin_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'), user_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') SELECT count(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT ld.DOC_ID ID ,ld.NAME ,ld.DESCR ,ld.PROVIDER ,ld.STATUS_ID ,ld.TIME_STAMP ,ld.GID ,ld.DOC_TYPE_ID ,ld.PARENT_DOC_ID ,ld.CTIME ,ld.CUSER_ID ,ld.MUSER_ID ,ld.MTIME ,ld.DOC_ID ,ldv.STORAGE_ID ,ldv.FILE_NAME ,u.login CUSER_ID_LBL ,sr.descr STATUS_ID_LBL ,TR.DESCR DOC_TYPE_ID_LBL FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC ld LEFT JOIN WEB50.LIB_DOC_VERSION ldv ON ldv.DOC_ID=ld.DOC_ID JOIN web50.b_status_ref sr ON ld.status_id = sr.status_id LEFT JOIN web50.b_user_private u ON ld.cuser_id = u.user_id JOIN web50.lib_doc_type_ref tr ON tr.doc_type_id = ld.doc_type_id
WHERE ld.DOC_TYPE_ID = 38 AND (((ld.status_id = 1 OR (ld.cuser_id = :USER_ID AND ld.status_id = 0 )) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_grants)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admin_grants))) d WHERE {FILTER}

WITH admin_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'), user_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') SELECT {COLUMNS_FILTER} FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY {ORDER_COLUMNS} ) RWN ,all_in_one.ID,all_in_one.CUSER_ID,all_in_one.STATUS_ID,all_in_one.NAME,all_in_one.CTIME,all_in_one.FILE_NAME FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ld.DOC_ID ID ,ld.NAME ,ld.DESCR ,ld.PROVIDER ,ld.STATUS_ID ,ld.TIME_STAMP ,ld.GID ,ld.DOC_TYPE_ID ,ld.PARENT_DOC_ID ,ld.CTIME ,ld.CUSER_ID ,ld.MUSER_ID ,ld.MTIME ,ld.DOC_ID ,ldv.STORAGE_ID ,ldv.FILE_NAME ,u.login CUSER_ID_LBL ,sr.descr STATUS_ID_LBL ,TR.DESCR DOC_TYPE_ID_LBL FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC ld LEFT JOIN WEB50.LIB_DOC_VERSION ldv ON ldv.DOC_ID=ld.DOC_ID JOIN web50.b_status_ref sr ON ld.status_id = sr.status_id LEFT JOIN web50.b_user_private u ON ld.cuser_id = u.user_id JOIN web50.lib_doc_type_ref tr ON tr.doc_type_id = ld.doc_type_id WHERE ld.DOC_TYPE_ID = 41 AND (((ld.status_id = 1 OR (ld.cuser_id = :USER_ID AND ld.status_id = 0 )) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_grants)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admin_grants))) d WHERE {FILTER}) all_in_one) sorted WHERE RWN BETWEEN {LOW_LIMIT} AND {HIGH_LIMIT}

WITH admin_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_ADMIN' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1'), user_grants AS (SELECT 1 dummy FROM WEB50.B_USER_TO_B_ROLE u2r JOIN WEB50.B_ROLE_TO_B_POLICY r2p ON u2r.ROLE_ID = r2p.ROLE_ID JOIN WEB50.B_POLICY_RULES pr ON r2p.POLICY_ID = pr.POLICY_ID WHERE u2r.USER_ID = :USER_ID AND pr.CLASS_ID='WEB50_LIB_DOC_USER' AND pr.SELECT_PERMITTED = '1') SELECT count(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT ld.DOC_ID ID ,ld.NAME ,ld.DESCR ,ld.PROVIDER ,ld.STATUS_ID ,ld.TIME_STAMP ,ld.GID ,ld.DOC_TYPE_ID ,ld.PARENT_DOC_ID ,ld.CTIME ,ld.CUSER_ID ,ld.MUSER_ID ,ld.MTIME ,ld.DOC_ID ,ldv.STORAGE_ID ,ldv.FILE_NAME ,u.login CUSER_ID_LBL ,sr.descr STATUS_ID_LBL ,TR.DESCR DOC_TYPE_ID_LBL FROM WEB50.LIB_DOC ld LEFT JOIN WEB50.LIB_DOC_VERSION ldv ON ldv.DOC_ID=ld.DOC_ID JOIN web50.b_status_ref sr ON ld.status_id = sr.status_id LEFT JOIN web50.b_user_private u ON ld.cuser_id = u.user_id JOIN web50.lib_doc_type_ref tr ON tr.doc_type_id = ld.doc_type_id WHERE ld.DOC_TYPE_ID = 41 AND (((ld.status_id = 1 OR (ld.cuser_id = :USER_ID AND ld.status_id = 0 )) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_grants)) OR EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM admin_grants))) d WHERE {FILTER}
